channel.title: How to open most files at school
channel.description:
Ever annoyed that you don't have "sufficient rights" to open a file? I found out how to (at least at my school)! YOU NEED TO KNOW THE FILE NAME! It can't open something open another file though. You may be able to get into RegEDIT with this
1) Open My Computer 2) Click Search 3) Search for the file 4) Double-click the file you want

then click My Computer, and then you can access anything…

item.title: How to open most files at school
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“Agent766, post:1, topic:75815”]Ever annoyed that you don’t have “sufficient rights” to open a file? I found out how to (at least at my school)! YOU NEED TO KNOW THE FILE NAME! It can’t open something open another file though. You may be able to get into RegEDIT with this

  1. Open My Computer
  2. Click Search
  3. Search for the file
  4. Double-click the file you want[/quote]

I used to do this at my primary school ages ago. I was trying to find the admins account so i could know the password. I did it, but the admimistrator found out that there was something wrong. He didn’t know who the hell it was and he got cranky at the entire school. And was doing some investigating, but at least he didn’t find me guilty.

Read full topic
